title: Union Jack cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '65g unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '225ml cold filter coffee', '225ml milk', '120ml sunflower or rapeseed oil', '2 teaspoons vinegar', 'Icing', '40g butter, softened', '80g natural Greek yoghurt', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 pinch salt', '400g icing sugar, or as needed', 'Decorations', '200g blueberries', '200g raspberries', '1 punnet strawberries, hulled and halved']
